meanings.definition: A group of viruses causing respiratory infections in humans.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that parainfluenzas are viruses that can make you sick.
meanings.sent2: During flu season, many people catch parainfluenzas and experience coughing and sneezing.
meanings.sent3: The parainfluenzas decided to throw a party in the lungs, causing quite a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The spread of parainfluenzas through the community was like a wildfire, affecting everyone in its path.
meanings.sent5: The image of parainfluenzas attacking the body was both frightening and fascinating to learn about.

meanings.sent1: In the lab, they studied different strains of parainfluenzas to understand their variations.
meanings.sent2: The doctor's report mentioned several cases of parainfluenzas in the region.
meanings.sent3: At the pet store, the parainfluenzas were on sale - buy one, get one free!
meanings.sent4: The classroom was filled with parainfluenzas, each student representing a different strain.
meanings.sent5: The sight of so many parainfluenzas together was a rare occurrence, sparking curiosity among researchers.
